mapper.sql: course_id, type, name, price, discount, status, coach_id, coach_type, club_id, club_type, bz1,try_flag, bz2
mapper.select: select max(course_id) from course where course_id like CONCAT('%',date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into course (course_id, type, name, price, discount, status, coach_id, coach_type, club_id, club_type, bz1, bz2) values (#{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coachType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clubType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bz1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update course
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

coach_type = #{coachType,jdbcType=TINYINT},

bz1 = #{bz1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
try_flag = #{try_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bz2 = #{bz2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update course set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, coach_id = #{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coach_type = #{coachType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, club_type = #{clubType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bz1 = #{bz1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bz2 = #{bz2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
